job.title: Kafka developer
job.description: Should have worked in a Devops/ Agile environment. Proven experience in creation, deployment & use of a Kafka environment. Proven expertise in building and integrating large clustered Kafka environments. Proven experience coding & deploying Kafka streams. Experience with AWS, CI/CD and programming. Knowledge if confluent or Kafka Experience with Ansible Knowledge of General Web Infrastructure (tomcat, jboss etc..) Knowledge om Elastic search, Splunk will be an added
